title: Merchant Review Questions
description: Generate strategic questions for merchant performance review based on sales and customer data
prompt: I'm presenting our quarterly sales data and customer metrics to a restaurant merchant. What questions should I be asking their team?
example:
Using sample restaurant data:
- Monthly revenue: $120,000
- Average order value: $35
- Customer repeat rate: 45%
- Peak hours: 12-2pm, 6-8pm

This will generate strategic questions like:
- With 45% of customers returning, what initiatives could increase our repeat customer rate?
- How can we increase sales during non-peak hours?
- What menu items drive the highest margins?
- Which delivery platforms are most profitable for us?
- How does our average order value compare to similar restaurants in the area?
author: GooseAI Team

data_type.description: The type of data being analyzed (e.g., sales data, customer metrics)

merchant_type.description: The type of merchant (e.g., restaurant, retail store)
